body.name: Earth Breeze Laundry Detergent Sheets - Fresh Scent - No Plastic Jug (60 Loads) 30 Sheets, Liquidless Technology…

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: POWERFUL CLEAN - An ultra-effective laundry detergent sheet that fights stains and odors in any cycle!
NO PLASTIC JUG! - Earth Breeze arrives in slim cardboard packaging. You’ll save so much space when you ditch those heavy plastic bottles and jugs.
EASY TO USE - NO mess, NO measuring, NO wasted detergent and NO goo.
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED - Earth Breeze Eco Sheets are dermatologist tested, hypoallergenic, bleach-free, dye-free, paraben-free, phosphate-free, phthalate-free, and certified cruelty-free.
TURN LAUNDRY INTO AN ACT OF KINDNESS - With each purchase, Earth Breeze donates 10 loads of detergent to those in need. Over 100 million loads donated and counting!
body.description: So easy to use: 1) Remove a sheet from the lightweight packaging. 2) Place sheet in the wash. 3) Start your wash on any cycle and let your machine provide the water. 1 sheet for 1 full load. Half a sheet for a regular load. You will never go back to the old way of doing laundry. In fact, you will find it silly that we used to create so much plastic jug waste! Earth Breeze Eco sheets will easily dissolve in hot or cold water. They are low sudsing, ultra-concentrated, hypoallergenic, and give a powerful, deep clean. Our Eco Formula works in all machines, HE included. This innovative formula works on the toughest stains, dislodges dirt molecules, and leaves your clothes smelling fresh. It is time for options that avoid the plastic jug. Over 91% of all plastic products are not recycled and end up in landfills, oceans or elsewhere. Let’s un-jug together. Package dimensions: 8.75” (22.3cm) 5.75” (14.5cm) 1” (2.5cm)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel and home
reviews.reviewText: I bought these laundry sheets because I like to travel carry on and that can require that I wash the clothes mid-trip. It is light and compact. I put it in the dirty clothes bag, and it keeps the entire bag fresh. Easy to wash my clothes in the sink or a washer. This has been so convenient that I'm now using it at home too because I don't have to get heavy bottles off the shelf and risk my back. It's light weight, works great, easy to use and eco-friendly. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product On So Many Levels!
reviews.reviewText: This is my first purchase of this product. I decided to try this because for some reason have trouble with my liquid detergent always leaking from the cap because I don’t put it in right after using it (I know personal problems).Key points to note:• Stain Fighting Ability: I still use prewash stain remover sprays but out of the wash, the stains are gone.• Smell: eliminates all odor and clothes smell fresh after wash, not super strong scent, but I like that cause it doesn’t interfere with my colognes.• Skin Irritant: I have sensitive skin and this has not affected my skin in any way! Now people do have sensitivities for different elements in the world, but for me it’s been great!• Storage: saves so much space! And no messy liquids!• Waste: with only 9% of plastics being recycled, there’s like no waste! Just a very small piece of cardboard.• Value: Definitely worth every penny!*Definitely recommend for efficient cleaning power and also mindfulness for the environment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars New to these and liking so far
reviews.reviewText: I am moving away from as many chemicals AND plastics I can. It's HARD!!Pros: no plastic, lightweight for shipping, all packaging is recyclable, easy to dispense, GREAT for travel, nice scent.Cons: doesn't seem to work well in cooler water, may see "chunks" on clothes, picks off easily, scent is almost unnoticeable in finished laundry (I like clothes to "smell" clean"). Kind of off to store, I just stack a pile up and grab one as I go.These seem to work best if you add the detergent sheet first, and clothes in on top. They do seem to clean well. I love the low to now waste and less yucky chemicals in my laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Earth Breeze Sheets are Amazing
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these Earth Breeze sheets initially for my daughter who's in college. They were the best choice because she's on the 5th floor and the laundry facilities are in the basement. These sheets are so great because not only is the packaging minimal and light weight, it fits in the side pocket of her laundry bag.She loves the convenience of them, they smell good, easy to use and they keep her clothes clean. She loved them so much, that I decided to try them as well and I love them too. They free up so much space in my laundry room and I don't have to lift the heave bottles of laundry detergent which I'm grateful for because I have issues with my elbows.Also, and best of all they are better for our environment! I just love that! Try them, I'm sure you will love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very satisfied with Earth Breeze. It washes clothes well without making too many suds, which represents a savings in water because you don't need to rinse twice. In addition, it does not take up much space in the laundry room and contributes to the ecology of our planet. I'm glad the makers of Earth Breeze came up with the idea of making this product. The only downside is that it has no fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. I tested it on soiled white towels and they were clean after washing. We’re not a fan of perfumes so we use the unscented. At times when we have a big load or yard clothing we’ve used two sheets and have been very satisfied with the results. We love not having the plastic jugs. Every little bit helps our environment. Great job to the company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After reading the reviews, I expected when I used a sheet that it would leave a scent of some kind, but I was impressed that it left no scent. Our clothes came out clean and smelling fresh. I followed the directions and only used 1/4, 1/2 or a whole sheet depending on how big my load was in the washer. I have a front loading machine, so I place my sheet in the dispenser. After washing, there is residue left in the dispenser but I quickly rinsed it out. Very convenient to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great idea, adequate performance
reviews.reviewText: I love the concept of laundry sheets. No more bulky detergent containers in my small house. No need to ship heavy containers all over the country. No empty plastic jugs to send to the landfill. Easy to tear to whatever size is needed so there's no waste like there is with pods.Cleaning performance is slightly less than a good liquid detergent, but the other benefits make the trade off worth it to me. If I pre-treat spots or pre-soak heavily soiled items it does fine. I use the unscented version.Bonus: great for travel! So convenient in our RV or even in a hotel room sink.
La presentación es simplemente inmejorable. Y como detergente, resultados maravillosos. Si acaso, se agradecería más aroma, aunque no llega a ser una queja.

reviews.reviewerName: Excelente opción para dejar de usar botellas de plástico
reviews.reviewText: Es práctico, la ropa queda limpia y tiene buen aromaAlgo caro
Saving the worldThese sheets seem to work perfectly no heavy bottles no spills and messes just one sheet and do your laundry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Love the ease of use and the fact it takes up so little room. It really does wash your clothes too and you can feel smug at being ecologically friendly.
